roleset.name: talk down, slander
roleset.note: MALIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'malign' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from malign.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: can you justly malign anything?
example.text: The council's action is yet another blow to a sport that its fans claim [*T*-2]-1 has been maligned [*-1]unjustly for years.

roleset.name: harmful, perhaps as cancer
roleset.note: MALIGNANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. Comparison to benign.01 (from malignant.01-j)

example.name: args 2, 3
example.text: Breast cancer, which-1 *PRO*-1 is malignant for women worldwide, has led to considerable morbidity and mortality rates even in youths.
